name: Music_4531.wav
keywords: ['game music', 'quirky sounds', 'bassline', 'waterfall sounds', 'no lyrics', 'bird sounds', 'simple percussion', 'moderate tempo', 'violins', 'bubble sounds', 'xylophone sound']
caption: This song features sounds from a game. A groovy bassline is played. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple rhythm. A violin fill is played in the background. Quirky sounds are played in the foreground depicting some actions like jumping and crossing game levels. Birds can be heard chirping in the background. There is the sound of a waterfall toward the end of the clip. Bubble bursting sounds are played when the character collects some rewards. There are no lyrics in this song and no words being sung.
